questions.text: Have you configured Cloud Identity?
questions.description: Cloud Identity provides the foundation for managing user identities and access in Microsoft 365.

questions.text: Have you configured Intune enrollment?
questions.description: Device enrollment enables device management in Microsoft Intune.

questions.text: Have you deployed Microsoft Defender for Endpoint?
questions.description: Defender for Endpoint provides advanced endpoint protection against cyber threats.

questions.text: Have you deployed Multifactor Authentication?
questions.description: MFA adds an additional layer of security by requiring two or more verification methods.

questions.text: Have you configured Conditional Access Policies?
questions.description: Conditional Access helps you manage access to your resources based on specific conditions.

questions.text: Have you configured Intune compliance policies?
questions.description: Compliance policies define the rules and settings devices must meet to be compliant.

questions.text: Have you configured Microsoft Defender Vulnerability Management?
questions.description: Defender Vulnerability Management helps identify, assess, and remediate endpoint vulnerabilities.

questions.text: Have you implemented Extended Detection and Response (XDR)?
questions.description: XDR provides unified security incident detection and response across endpoints, identities, and cloud apps.

questions.text: Have you configured Identity Protection?
questions.description: Identity Protection uses machine learning to detect and prevent identity risks.

questions.text: Have you configured App Protection Policies?
questions.description: App protection policies help protect organization data within managed apps.

questions.text: Have you implemented Identity Governance and Administration?
questions.description: Identity Governance helps ensure the right users have the right access to the right resources.

questions.text: Have you configured Privileged Identity Management?
questions.description: PIM provides time-based and approval-based role activation to mitigate the risks of excessive privileges.

questions.text: Have you implemented Data Security and Privacy Management?
questions.description: DSPM helps discover, classify, and protect sensitive data across your cloud environment.

questions.text: Have you configured Endpoint DLP?
questions.description: Endpoint DLP helps prevent sensitive information from being shared inappropriately.

questions.text: Have you configured Endpoint Privilege Management?
questions.description: EPM helps manage and monitor privileged access on endpoints.

questions.text: Have you implemented Cloud PKI?
questions.description: Cloud PKI provides certificate lifecycle management for your devices and services.

questions.text: Have you configured Remote Help?
questions.description: Remote Help enables secure remote assistance for your users.

questions.text: Have you configured management for specialized devices?
questions.description: Specialized device management enables control over dedicated and shared devices.

questions.text: Have you implemented Windows Autopilot?
questions.description: Autopilot streamlines the deployment and configuration of new Windows devices.

questions.text: Have you configured Enterprise App Management?
questions.description: Enterprise App Management helps deploy and manage applications across your organization.

questions.text: Have you implemented Risk-Based Conditional Access?
questions.description: Risk-based Conditional Access uses real-time risk detection to protect your resources.
